author: cnbc.com
title: CarLabs Taps Former Carfax Executive As Its VP Business Development
text:
LOS ANGELES, March 19, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- CarLabs , the premiere creator of AI-powered digital assistants for the automotive industry has hired former Director of Automotive OEM Partnerships at Carfax, Joseph Schumacher as Vice President of Business Development. CarLabs currently works with automakers to create white-labeled digital assistants by applying artificial intelligence and natural language processing to an automotive brand's existing data.
Schumacher will leverage his 25 years of automotive industry expertise to strengthen CarLabs' OEM sales and product development efforts. Most recently, CarLabs created Kia Motor America's "Kian," a digital assistant that provides automated sales and customer service support on Kia.com and on Facebook Messenger. Kian produced a 50-fold increase in engagement on Facebook Messenger and continues to significantly improve conversion rates on key shopping actions, as well as augment live customer service.
Schumacher will lead efforts to increase adoption of CarLabs' current suite of solutions, as well as identify new opportunities throughout the vehicle ownership lifecycle. Current solutions focus on automating online sales and customer service, increasing ROI on digital ad campaigns, improving website conversion rates, capturing real-time customer feedback and automating response improvement.
"Joe's proven ability to establish and grow OEM partnerships by identifying strategic opportunities and providing innovative solutions makes him the ideal choice for CarLabs as we enter our most rapid growth phase," said Martin Schmitt, CEO and Co-Founder, CarLabs.
About CarLabs
CarLabs, headquartered in Calabasas, California, is the first company to create an AI-driven conversational commerce platform that allows consumers to interact directly with all of an automotive brand's digital assets as if they were talking to a human. By automating marketing, sales, and customer service via a 1:1 chatbot/user interface, CarLabs' customers have unlocked a new model of customer growth based on open data, applied insights, and mobile-led messaging.
To learn more, visit www.carlabs.com and follow-us on LinkedIn , Twitter and Facebook
